message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $20,000.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product is high, but my budget is limited. Would you consider lowering the price to $14,000?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but $20,000 is already a very competitive price for this product.  Could you meet me halfway at $17,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget, could we agree on $16,000 for the product?
